text: “niyata vaśayenma allāh dupteki; apima dhanavatunya” yayi kavurun pævasūvehuda, ovungē vadana niyata vaśayenma savan dunnēya. (mesē) ovun pævasīmada, asādhāraṇayē nabivarunva ovun ghātanaya kirīmada, niyata vaśayenma api saṭahan karaminma siṭinnemu. (ebævin paralovadī ovunṭa) “davālana dan̆ḍuvama oba (poḍiyak) vin̆da balanu” yayi api kiyannemu
